headline: What Makes These 3 Oil & Gas Drilling Stocks Worth Watching?
summary: Following a careful analysis of the Zacks Oil and Gas - Drilling industry, we advise focusing on companies like RIG, HP and PDS.

headline: HP (HPQ) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of personal computing and printing company HP (NYSE:HPQ) fell 2.6% in the morning session after Evercore ISI downgraded the stock's rating to 'In Line' from 'Outperform', citing concerns about future demand.

headline: Tariff-driven PC pull-ins pose risk to HP Inc’s 2026 outlook
summary: Investing.com -- Evercore ISI downgraded HP Inc to In Line from Outperform as there is limited upside to earnings and cash flow estimates as tariff-related PC pull-ins may cloud demand in 2026.

headline: Brand-New Tech to Sell from Just £1
summary: Over 1,000 Brand-New HP Thin Clients Auctioned from £1, present an unmissable opportunity for bargains for businesses, resellers, and eco-conscious buyersLONDON, Sept. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Lloyds Auctions is offering the chance to acquire premium computing technology at rock-bottom prices, with more than 1,000 brand-new Hewlett Packard (HP) Thin Clients hitting the online auction block this month.
